ConceptDef.label: Tinker's Construct : Stove
ConceptDef.helpText:
A standard stove(inside 3x3) are usually composed by 3 wall heater, 2 inputer,2 inputer hopper, 2 outputer, 1 stove core.
The insideroom should placed FULL FLOOR and FULL ROOF.And the room must surrounded by walls, because the inputer and outputer can only build on the wall.

The stove system can also can do most thing when the core temptrue highter than 1600

ConceptDef.label: Tinker's Construct : Assemble Weapon
ConceptDef.helpText: When you sele an pawn, you can open the "Assemble Weapon" tab by right click the machining table to selet the "Assemble Weapon"

ConceptDef.label: Tinker's Construct : Strengthen Weapon
ConceptDef.helpText: When you sele an pawn, you can open the "Strengthen Weapon" tab by right click the machining table to selet the "Strengthen Weapon"

ConceptDef.label: Tinker's Construct : InPuter
ConceptDef.helpText: If you want to input the things to stove, the inputer hopper should rotate to the same way like the mark when you selet the inputer.And the another mark should on the stove core\n\nInputer can only build on the wall.

ConceptDef.label: Tinker's Construct : OutPuter
ConceptDef.helpText: If you want to output the things from stove, the outputer should has a "Cooling Bucket" or "Casting Table" on the mark when you selet the outputer.And the another mark should on the stove core\n\nInputer can only build on the wall. you can click the "selet output things" to change the outputer output things

ConceptDef.label: Tinker's Construct : Cooling Bucket
ConceptDef.helpText: Cooling Bucket can cooldown the material from stove. And it got the material from OutPuter.

ConceptDef.label: Tinker's Construct : Casting Table
ConceptDef.helpText: Casting Table can Cast up the single material thing when you install a mould.When you selet a pawn,you can install a mould by right click the "Casting Table". And it got the material from OutPuter.

ConceptDef.label: Tinker's Construct : Make Mould
ConceptDef.helpText: You can make Mould on "Sculpting Table",and set target thing by right click when you selet an pawn.
